live_updates: Power is still being restored by the local power company. As areas get power back online, our technicians will restore services to that area. Please visit the following page for updates on power outage:https://electricoutages.lethbridge.ca/

This interruption is related to a power outage in the area. Our technicians are working to restore service as soon as power has been restored. We will continue to monitor the situation and provide updates as they become available.https://electricoutages.lethbridge.ca/
32254.summary: Some customers in Lethbridge are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
32254.title: Jan 19 – Lethbridge | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
